price: “Mu by’ukuri abagaragu banjye (b’abemeramana nyakuri) nta bushobozi uzabagiraho. Kandi Nyagasani wawe arahagije kuba umurinzi.”
arabic: إِنَّ عِبَادِي لَيۡسَ لَكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ سُلۡطَٰنٞۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِرَبِّكَ وَكِيلٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: inna ʿibādī laysa laka ʿalayhim sul'ṭānun wakafā birabbika wakīlan
